Items.Title: Resolution calling on the City of New York to acknowledge the years of suffering of all those involved in the Central Park Jogger case, including both the five men whose convictions were vacated and the jogger herself, by settling this matter out of court as expeditiously as possible in order to avoid a continuation of this painful, lengthy and costly legal proceeding that will only cause further anguish for all parties involved.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Acknowledge the years of suffering of all those involved in the Central Park Jogger case.
